title: What is a cleopatra personality? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are talking about Ancient Cleopatra then the best answer would be a strong and intellectual person since she had a knowledge of different political ideas in Ancient Egypt. If you are talking about the Shakespearean Cleopatra in “Anthony and Cleopatra” by Shakespeare then her personality would be very Shakespearean. Examples would be very theatrical in all of her actions and could fit the term of show off. Hope this helps.

I had just started dating her when Marc Athony showed up and started profiling the “I’m from Rome, so I am better than you stuff” I would have beat the sass out of him but the had all those Pretorians guarding him with those short pointy swords. Needles to say Cleo and I never had much time alone after he showed up. We went skinny dipping in the Nile one night, but I never administered the MBTI tho. She was too ADHD to complete it anyway. But if you press me I'd guess ESFP. She threw a good party but would go on forever about all she did and how she made the humus dip and lamb chops. Boring …
